Title: Wicked City
Writer: Hideyuki Kikuchi (novel), Yoshiaki Kawajiri (screenplay), Norio Osada (screenplay)
Actors: Yûsaku Yara, Toshiko Fujita, Ichirô Nagai, Takeshi Aono
Plot: There has been peace between the worlds of the mortals and the supernatural for centuries, but the balance is now being threatened. The Radical elements from the Supernatural world are crossing over into the mortal universe for the purpose of destroying the peace forever!
